SVGAttributeFill.summary: The fill attribute has two different meanings. For shapes and text it's a presentation attribute that defines the color (or any SVG paint servers like gradients or patterns) used to paint the element; for animation it defines the final state of the animation.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
For animation, these elements are using this attribute: 'animate', 'animateMotion', 'animateTransform', and 'set'.
